Subskills.name: Mini Sarmat
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of rockets fired by rocket turret.

Subskills.name: Blasting Power
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by rocket turret.

Subskills.name: Locked On
Subskills.description: Fires a bigger barrage of missiles that target an area dealing massive damage over three seconds. Attack speed reduced.

Subskills.name: Rocket Turrets
Subskills.description: Increases the maximum amount of rocket turrets.

Subskills.name: Mininuke
Subskills.description: Increases explosion area of effect of rocket turret projectiles.

Subskills.name: Multiblast
Subskills.description: Chance on hit for rocket turret projectiles to explode additional times with increased damage.

Subskills.name: Field Scanner
Subskills.description: Increases the range of rocket turret.

Subskills.name: The Boom Box
Subskills.description: Rocket turret turns into an exploding turret that repeatedly explodes in place dealing increased damage to monsters hit.

Subskills.name: Blastwave
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to create a shockwave of additional explosions.

Subskills.name: Quick Silo
Subskills.description: Increases the rate of fire for rocket turret.

Subskills.name: Stun Blast
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to knockback and stun target dealing additional damage.

Subskills.name: Barret Shot
Subskills.description: Instead fires a single .50 Cal sniper round that explodes on first monster hit dealing massive attack damage.

Subskills.name: Big Bertha
Subskills.description: Increases the damage, projectile speed and explosion area of effect radius of the rockets.
